trans-unit.source: Used by data source controls when implementing the members defined by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato dai controlli origine dati quando si implementa i membri definiti per il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource"> </xref> interfaccia.
Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The ListSourceHelper class is a utility class provided to simplify implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface by data source controls.
trans-unit.target: La classe ListSourceHelper è fornita per semplificare l'implementazione di una classe di utilità di <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interfaccia dai controlli origine dati.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource> interface but do not extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class can use the static ListSourceHelper methods in their own implementations of the methods defined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
trans-unit.target: Origine dati, i controlli che implementano il <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>interfaccia ma non si estende il <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>classe può utilizzare i metodi statici di ListSourceHelper nelle implementazioni dei metodi definiti per il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interfaccia.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Data source controls that extend from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl> class inherit these method implementations automatically.
trans-unit.target: I controlli che si estendono da origine dati di <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>classe ereditano queste implementazioni del metodo automaticamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified data source control contains a collection of data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il controllo origine dati specificata contiene una raccolta di oggetti vista origine dati.

trans-unit.source: Use this method in an implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.ContainsListCollection%2A> property, passing a reference to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo in un'implementazione del <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.ContainsListCollection%2A>proprietà, passando un riferimento a un controllo origine dati.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource.ContainsListCollection%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> that specifies the data source control to test for associated data source view objects.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"> </xref> che specifica il controllo origine dati per verificare la presenza di oggetti vista origine dati associata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data source control contains a collection of data source view objects; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il controllo origine dati contiene una raccolta di oggetti vista origine dati in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of data source objects.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un <xref:System.Collections.IList>raccolta di oggetti origine dati.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Use this method in an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A> method, passing a reference to a data source control.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo in un'implementazione del <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A>, passando un riferimento a un controllo origine dati.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.System%23ComponentModel%23IListSource%23GetList%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IList> object that is returned implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface.

You can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetItemProperties%2A> method to retrieve a list of <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> descriptors that correspond to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> names associated with the data source control from the list.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetItemProperties%2A>metodo per recuperare un elenco di <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>descrittori corrispondenti per il <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView>nomi associati al controllo origine dati dall'elenco.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetItemProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> that contains one or more associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects, which are retrieved by a call to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames*>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"> </xref> che contiene uno o più <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> gli oggetti che vengono recuperati da una chiamata a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.GetViewNames*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> of one <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"></xref> has one or more associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> objects; otherwise, returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.IList>di uno <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"> </xref>, se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataSource"> </xref> con uno o più associata <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> oggetti; in caso contrario, restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>
